rory.name: Rory
rory.temperament: Food motivated, VERY VERY VOCAL, clingy, kinda dumb.
rory.description: The shelter told me that he's a maine coon mix, but I don't really see it. I mean, look at him. He's literally just a silly goofy little boy. My ray of sunshine, my little pogchamp, he is my WORLD!

mimi.name: mimi
mimi.description: Mimi is very fat and loves to eat. She is scared of water and loves bird watching.
